001package edu.pdx.cs410J;
002
003import java.io.Serializable;
004import java.util.Date;
005
006/**
007 * This class represents an appointment found in an appointment book.
008 * Each appointment has a beginning and ending time, as well as a text
009 * message describing itself.
010 *
011 * @author David Whitlock
012 */
013public abstract class AbstractAppointment implements Serializable
014{
015
016  /**
017   * Returns a String describing the beginning date and time of this
018   * appointment.
019   */
020  public abstract String getBeginTimeString();
021
022  /**
023   * Returns a String describing the ending date and time of this
024   * appointment.
025   */
026  public abstract String getEndTimeString();
027
028  /**
029   * Returns the {@link Date} that this appointment begins.
030   */
031  public Date getBeginTime() {
032    return null;
033  }
034
035  /**
036   * Returns the {@link Date} that this appointment ends.
037   */
038  public Date getEndTime() {
039    return null;
040  }
041
042  /**
043   * Returns a description of this appointment (for instance,
044   * <code>"Have coffee with Marsha"</code>).
045   */
046  public abstract String getDescription();
047
048  /**
049   * Returns a brief textual summary of this appointment.
050   */
051  public final String toString() {
052    return this.getDescription() + " from " +
053      this.getBeginTimeString() + " until " + this.getEndTimeString();
054  }
055
056}
